info.title: MyRide
info.description: This document describes the MyRide API, built with Laravel (PHP), MySQL as the primary database, and Firebase for cloud storage and NoSQL data storage.

post.description: This authentication request is used to access the application and obtain an authorization token for accessing all protected APIs. This request interacts with the MySQL database.

401.description: account is not found or have wrong password

post.description: This authentication request is used to get token validation after register. This request interacts with the MySQL database and using mailer.

200.description: the validation token has been sended to {email} email account

message.example: the validation token has been sended to flazen.edu@gmail.com email account

409.description: there already a request with same username / username has been used. try another

message.example: there already a request with same username

post.description: This authentication request is used to get token validation after register. This request interacts with the MySQL database and using mailer.

message.example: username has been used. try another

post.description: This authentication request is used to regenerate a token after user has failed to validate their previous token. This request interacts with the MySQL database and using mailer.

200.description: the validation token has been sended to {email} email account

message.example: the validation token has been sended to flazen.edu@gmail.com email account
the validation token has been sended to flazen.edu@gmail.com email account

get.description: This authentication request is used to sign out from application or reset current session. This request interacts with the MySQL database.

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete a dictionary entry based on the provided `ID`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and have a protected routes.

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

post.description: This request is used to created a dictionary by using given `dictionary_type`, and `dictionary_name`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and have a protected routes.

message.example: dictionary name must be at least 2 characters
dictionary type must be one of the following values trip_category, vehicle_merk, vehicle_type, vehicle_category, vehicle_status, vehicle_default_fuel, vehicle_fuel_status, vehicle_transmission_code
dictionary name has been used. try another

get.description: This request is used to get dictionary by its `dictionary_type`, that can be trip_category, vehicle_merk, vehicle_type, vehicle_category, vehicle_status, vehicle_default_fuel, vehicle_fuel_status, or vehicle_transmission_code. This request interacts with the MySQL database and can be accessed as public routes or protected routes. When accessed with a token (protected routes), the returned list includes both public and private dictionaries. When accessed without a token, only public dictionaries are returned.

200.description: Dictionary fetched successfully. Ordered in ascending order by `dictionary_type` and `dictionary_name`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete a driver entry based on the provided `ID`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

delete.summary: Hard Delete Driver Relation With Vehicle By ID
delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete a driver relation with vehicle entry based on the provided driver relation `ID`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes.

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

404.description: driver relation failed to permentally deleted

get.description: This request is used to get all driver. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and a pagination.

200.description: Driver fetched successfully. Ordered in ascending order by `created_at`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

post.description: This request is used to create a driver by using given `username`, `fullname`, `password`, `telegram_user_id`, `email`, `phone`, and `notes`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.description: This request is used to get all driver with his assigned vehicle. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and a pagination.

200.description: Driver fetched successfully. Ordered in descending order by driver relation's `created_at`

vehicle_list.example: D 1610 ZBC - Brio RS MT, D 4110 ADC - Toyota Innova

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

post.description: This request is used to create a driver - vehicle relation by using given `vehicle_id`, `driver_id`, and `relation_note`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, broadcast message with Telegram, and audited activity (history).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.description: This request is used to get all driver name. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes.

200.description: Driver fetched successfully. Ordered in ascending order by `fullname`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.summary: Get All Driver - Vehicle Relation For Management / Assigning
get.description: This request is used to get all driver with their assigned vehicle for management / assigning. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes.

401.description: Protected route  requires sign-in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login
something went wrong. please contact admin

delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete an error history based on the provided `ID`. However, it will also search for all errors with the same `message` and delete them. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes (Admin only).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.description: This request is used to get all error audit. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes (Admin only), and a pagination.

200.description: Error fetched successfully. Ordered in ascending order by `created_at`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.description: This request is used to export all wash data (dataset). To test it, you must execute the request in a web browser to download the file. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, exported file, and broadcast message with Telegram.

200.description: Export wash successfully. File downloaded as `xlsx` format and ordered in descending order by `created_at`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

This request is using MySQL database and send Telegram Message.

telegram_user_id.description: Telegram Account ID for Bot Apps

telegram_is_valid.description: Validation status of attached telegram account

email.description: Email for Auth and Task Scheduling

created_at.description: Timestamp when the admin was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the admin was updated

message.description: Message or description of the error

stack_trace.description: Trail of function calls leading up to the error

file.description: Path of the file where the error is faced

line.description: Line of code in specific file where the error is faced

created_at.description: Timestamp when the error was faced

faced_by.description: ID of the user who specific faced the error

type.description: Type of the failed jobs on Task Scheduling

status.description: Status of the failed jobs on Task Scheduling
